content: Say I had a questionnaire, and an ongoing process to collect responses, and a large and growing set of responses. And now, I want to report some stats off the responses. Has anyone looked at using Measure / MeasureReport for this?
Not sure why the answer would be any different for QuestionnaireResponse than for any other resource...
that doesn't tell me what the answer is
I'm just suggesting it's not necessarily a #questionnaire -specific question

@Grahame Grieve , yes, we've looked at using Measure/MeasureReport for this, as part of public health indicator reporting. The approaches I've seen so far create Observations out of the QuestionnaireResponse content and build the Measure/MeasureReport on those Observations.
